title: Data Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial
Interview Descriptions: Multiple interviews, one being a group interview. Fast process and good communication. I felt as though the job role was still developing and management lacked confidence when verbalizing what the job duties were.
Interview Questions: What do you currently do in your job today that prepares you for this role?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Interview Descriptions: It took forever for HR to get back to me after I applied for the job, literally half a year. So unprofessional, it's a terrible company. No one should work for them.
Interview Questions: How many years of experience do you have?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview experience was awful. I am a new graduate nurse, and was told through the ad that new grad nurses are welcome. I came to the interview, and they pretty much made me seem worthless. The interviewers were rude and they basically scoffed at me when they found out I was a new graduate nurse. I would never recommend working for this company after this experience.
Interview Questions: Can you tell me about yourself?

title: Management Interview
Interview Descriptions: If you have the credentials to back you, interview process is fairly simple. Many of the questions asked pertain to your ability and background the job. Some questions may endeavor to the path of what your past jobs consisted of. Most questions are given with scenarios related to your ability and determination to accomplish tasks
Interview Questions: What would you want to change or do differently here to stand out from previous jobs

title: ER Nurse Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview was an easy process. It did take a while to hear a response however. I would recommend interviewing to those who are interested. Be prepared and you can do it!
Interview Questions: Describe a time you had a conflict at work.

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial
Interview Descriptions: Due to the current Covid situation my interview process was very different than any interview I’ve had before. I was on a call with all the managers and charge nurses from the units I was interested in.
Interview Questions: Can you work well with others?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial
Interview Descriptions:
Quick interview with department manager and clinical staff nurse. Both were very nice,  questions were fairly easy. 
Great company with good benefits & PTO. Patients were nice and easy to get along with

title: Patient Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: I received a call two weeks after applying. Went in for my first interview. The manager was polite and made the process feel easy. Was called back for a second, "working" interview two weeks later. Waiting to hear back from the company.

title: Medical Scribe Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions:
it was done quickly, you just get there at the office let them know that you are here for the interview, you see the adviser and talk to him/her she says you might need to study a lot and you say yes.
You come back a few days later, take test and you get to be a member of the hospital scribes.

title: Clinical Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: 4 hour departmental interview which consisted of half hour to one-hour sessions with director/clinical pharmacy manager, staff/clinical pharmacists and technicians, short tour of the department and hospital.... .... .... ..... ..... .... ..... ... ...... ..... .... .....
Interview Questions: A time when you made a recommendation that made a difference?

title: Transporter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: I sat down with the manager and nursing supervisor and discussed why I wanted the job.  I loved how friendly and happy they were. They never made me feel uncomfortable and created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
Interview Questions: Why do you want this job?

title: Communications Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with the department head for the first interview. Called back for a second interview to meet with department staff. The HR rep also met with me on the second interview and asked me some interview questions as well as what my salary requirements would be.
Interview Questions: HTML knowledge and my thoughts on WordPress.

title: Catering Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Mar 2011
Interview Descriptions: Interview was brief and simple. Questions were relatively easy. Looked for competent people. Did not seem very invested in the experience. Manager was very condescending. Was held in the hospital in the dining area. Seemed as if they just needed someone to fill the spot. Was not extremely professional.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply for the job?

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: 2 hours long, met the nurse manager and several staff nurses.  I got a brief tour of the unit.  I got to see a patient room that was empty.  I met and talked to the intensivist on duty and had a question and answer session with the nurse manager and another nurse.  I was able to observe a normal day in the unit.
Interview Questions: How I learned how to think critically?

title: RN Clinical Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Frederick Memorial (Frederick, MD) in Aug 2010
Interview Descriptions: Applying on line was easy.  I was called within the next few days for an interview the next week.  The interview went fairly well.  Am waiting to hear if I will be called back for another interview later this week.
